identity.mission: Create a 'Industrial Royal' aesthetic that merges manufacturing precision with established corporate legacy.
principles: Content is King: Every pixel serves the '35M parts shipped' scale
Negative Space: White space is luxury
Contrast: Deep Navy vs. Stark White

theme.strategy: The Performance Pro (Archetype 2) modified for Royal Corporate

headings.usage: All H1-H3 headings. This provides the 'Royal' look requested.

rules: Never use gradients for backgrounds. Solid White (#FFFFFF) only.
Use Deep Navy (#202E4A) for all primary text and headings.
Use Red (#E63946) ONLY for primary Call-to-Actions (Buttons).

layout.grid_strategy: Bento Grid for Services. Mix of 1x1, 2x1, and 2x2 cards.

hero.structure: Full height (min-h-[80vh]). Background image with heavy Navy overlay (bg-primary/80). Centered typography.
hero.typography: H1 in Playfair Display, text-white, text-5xl md:text-7xl.
hero.cta: Solid Red button, sharp corners or slight radius (rounded-md).

stats.style: Clean white background, navy text. No boxes.

services.cards: White cards, shadow-sm, hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300. 1px border-slate-100.

logos.style: Grayscale logos, opacity-50 hover:opacity-100. If images unavailable, use elegant Serif text for brand names.

navbar.style: Sticky, White background, shadow-sm. Navy text. Red CTA button 'Contact Us'.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. TAILWIND CONFIG: Update theme colors to match the palette defined above. Extend font family: 'serif': ['Playfair Display', ...defaultTheme.fontFamily.serif].
3. SHADCN: Use 'card', 'button', 'input', 'label', 'textarea', 'dialog', 'sheet' components. Customize them to remove default rounded-xl if present, prefer rounded-md.
4. IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash URLs. Add 'object-cover' to all images.
5. LOGOS: Since specific brand logos (Ford, BMW) are copyrighted, render them as high-end text logos in the 'Client' section using the Playfair font in grayscale, or use placeholders if you prefer.
6. MAP: Use an iframe for the Google Map in the Contact section. Address: 'Windsor, Ontario' (Generic automotive hub location for context).
7. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, links, inputs).
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic blue gradients. No 'robot' icons.
Micro-interactions: Add hover states to everything.
Spacing: Use 'py-24' for section spacing. Don't cram content.
Accessibility: Ensure Navy text on White bg meets contrast (it does, 13:1).
